Suggestion for MR4 Event Entrants
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): The Locker Room (Q&A): Suggestion for MR4 Event Entrants
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 18, 2004 - 08:04 pm:

From now on, it would be a lot easier for everyone concerned if the saves we get for tourneys just have the monster being entered on the ranch. When there is more than one, it means the host has to look up which to research and move to a vs save. This can be time consuming in a 4+ entrant event, adding a lot of frustration for the host. So, please, when making your entry, just have the monster being entered on the ranch.

By Petit-Trot on Friday, November 19, 2004 - 07:46 pm:

I will not be asking this for the Metropolis Champions.
